ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Why have Rangers?
ygData.msgSnippet: Wouldn t a druid with a good weapon (fast delay and high damage) be good as a part-time tank at post-20? ... [Click Here!] ... Wouldn t a druid with a good
ygData.messageBody:
Wouldn't a druid with a good weapon (fast delay and high damage) be good as a part-time tank at post-20?
 

Amy Williams wrote:

This is true: I am a very pround L25 almost 26 druid and I can't hit for
crap... LOL Druids are meant to be all around...fillers. We round out the
group, cause we can do almost all of it (melee not included hehe)
My 2¢
Synthea Firestorm from Drinal server

----- Original Message -----
From: "Danspath" <danspth@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, April 18, 2001 6:04 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Why have Rangers?
 

> >why have a ranger at all?
>
> Melee. Druids that get up and try to melee post 20 are
> an irritant and a waste of time better spent medding.
>
>
>
> --- "IT3 Adam J. Daingerfield"
> <persona@...> wrote:
> > Rangers = fighting druids?
> >
> > That's what I think.
> >
> > I mean it...once the druids get tracking at level
> > 20...why have a ranger at
> > all?
> >
> >
> > just me bitching is all :>
> >
> >
> >
>
>
